p.d: The Foulards Noirs (black scarves), a collective association of women farmers and farmers' wives, want to draw attention to the crisis lived by small farmers and their families. They wear black as a sign of mourning for an activity that no longer provides a living. Anne Gintzburger recounts their fight. Directed by: Anne Gintzburger (France, 2017) Narrated by: Catherine Deneuve
